title: Bards Dancing Meep is gone!! [Gameplay]
body:
May be an irrelevant little bug, but the Meep that dances with Bard is gone! I hope the little bugger wasn't removed intentionally because him running through Bards arms was absolutely awesome.

Recreation of Bug (on NA Server here):
1) Play Bard on Classic Skin. (I don't own Bard's Elderwood skin and too poor to buy it right now to see if the skin is also bugged)
2) Type in /dance.
3) Bard dances, but his soul is not in it because his Meep is not dancing with him. 

If Bard could cry, he would be. His dancing Meep was his BFF and Bard misses him just like Pluto misses being a planet. Please Rito, give Bard his BFF back.

Thanks!
~watermaester

Edit: FOR GRAMMAR!

replies.body:
Hey Watermaester!

This is definitely a bug! We'll see where this little guy off to! Thanks for the report! :]
Thanks for helping him find his BFF! I appreciate them being united once again!! Check the Elderwood skin to see if that's also bugged since I don't have it :P
So, uh. Any progress towards finding the lost little meep?

This issue hasn't been immediately fixed since the issue isn't as gamebreaking as other issues (Rumble and Viktor being disabled, for example). 

Lemme poke the team and see where we're at with this. :]

> On it!

Just want to say, for me the meep is still gone! Bard is by far my favorite champ so i hope you can fix it :( P.S It works on elderwood! {{champion:432}}
I'm gonna bump this post too, seems like this problem sorta slipped between the cracks...
FIX IT, FIX IT, FIX IT, FIX IT, FIX IT, FIX IT, FIX IT!!!!!!!!
